DATA_DATE,
START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_BY,UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{recordId},#{stationCode},#{passenger},#{dataType},
to_date(#{dataDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{createBy}, sysdate,#{createBy}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE OPERATE_PASSENGER_FLOW_INFO SET PASSENGER=#{passenger}, VERSION = VERSION + 1, UPDATE_BY=#{updateBy}, UPDATE_DATE=sysdate WHERE ID=#{id} and VERSION=#{version}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.ID,t1.RECORD_ID,t1.STATION_CODE,t1.PASSENGER,VERSION,t2.STATION_NAME FROM TRAFFIC_PASSENGER_INFO t1 LEFT JOIN SYS_STATION t2 on t1.STATION_CODE = t2.STATION_CODE WHERE DEL_FLAG = '0' AND START_DATE >= to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=END_DATE ORDER BY t1.PASSENGER DESC
